tool_description: This API is used to retrieve UFO sightings. 88,000 reports were used to create this API
name: Ufo Aficionado API
title: Ufo Aficionado API

api_list.name: Get By Date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufo-aficionado-api.p.rapidapi.com/ufos/date/2019-03-29/page/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufo-aficionado-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufo-aficionado-api.p.rapidapi.com/ufos/date/{date}/page/{pagenumber}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufo-aficionado-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
